onlySlot.heading: Only slot
onlySlot.text: Here we've only sent data to the slot and nothing with the parameters.

image.heading: Card images
image.text: The images can be set to cover 100% of the width or if you wish set padded to true to keep the image in the middle. You can also set a background color which can be seen in the example with padding.

buttons.heading: Buttons
buttons.text: You can configure a card with buttons that will be rendered in the footer.

containeraware.heading: Container Aware
containeraware.text: Enables container awareness on the component (adjusts layout depending on available space).

action.heading: Card has action
action.text: Adds visual effect to indicate that the card has an action attached (i.e. a link)

highlight.heading: Hightlight Card
highlight.text: A modifier to highlight the card.

panelBordered.heading: bottom border on header
panelBordered.text: Adds bottom border to the header.
